alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Gratiot; Ingham (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 23 at 11:27PM EDT until July 23 at 11:45PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM EDT FOR INGHAM...GRATIOT AND CLINTON COUNTIES... At 1126 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ithaca to near Elsie to 5 miles west of Mason, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 1115 pm, 60 mph was reported at the Capital City Airport in Lansing. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lansing... Mason... St. Johns... Ithaca... East Lansing... Grand Ledge... Williamston... Elsie... Edgemont Park... DeWitt... Eureka... Sumner... Ovid... Webberville... Fowler... North Star... Westphalia... Maple Rapids... Dansville... Ashley... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
